website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want an alternative to plastic step platforms.
pros: A unique design that boasts high-grade steel construction and easy-to-fold legs
cons: Has only two height options, and it's heavy compared to similar-sized models

customer_reviews.title: I have bad knees and this definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an additional step for the steps going into our camper. I have bad knees and this definitely helps. You can either use it with the legs folded up or extended just depends on what you need. It is a bit heavy but is well built. Definitely will last. Well, it is July 2017 and I still love this product. It has taken some abuse and still is very solid. The weight is something to get used to but I don't mind. As well and solid as it is build, I would definitely recommend this product. Definitely worth the money. Everyone that we camp with ends up buying one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Step!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father who has trouble getting into our car and he loves it. The fact that it has 2 heights is great. Right now we are using it without the legs extended, when he gets a bit stronger we will use the legs. The platform is the right size and easy to navigate, he really likes the non slip tread. It is very sturdy and gives him a sense of security, this platform will last.
customer_reviews.author: Poe Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and solid. I used this with my Travel Trailer and it worked great. Plus: Doesn't move once placed even when slightly bumped, which is safer. Wide stance allows for stable use from the side. Non-skid surface nicely rough. I'm 275lbs and felt NO flex. Very solid. Cons: Lifting and storing a heavy step isn't fun. Steel will eventually rust; Not a permanent solution for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Booth

customer_reviews.title: THE PRODUCT IS EXCELLENT! Why would they not have stoppers to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Listen,you have a huge flaw in this item.I can't even believe it's this simple.The stool has no rubber stoppers.unacceptable.!!THE PRODUCT IS EXCELLENT!Why would they not have stoppers to keep it from sliding.MY MOTHER GOT UP ON THE BED,NO PROBLEM.SHE LOVES IT .SHE GOES TO STAND UP AN IT SLIDES.WHAT CAN WE DO,I WOULD HATE TO HAVE TO SEND IT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Slip-resistant top coating bubbled after a couple years...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for our travel trailer and plenty strong enough to feel secure. But, the "coating" on the top for slip-resistance is just a sheet of sand-paper-like sheet of water-proof material glued on. After exposure to the sun and rain, it started getting bubbles of air or water under it. My plan is to remove that sheet after it gets looser and PAINT ON a new slip-resistant top surface.
customer_reviews.author: EddieLivin'

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid, easy to use step. We bought it as an extra step for our rv and have used it several times. It can definitely bear the weight of a large adult and is broad enough to keep anyone from stumbling. The legs fold up nicely to make it easy to store. I've seen some reviews that say it is too heavy, but we don't think so. It is definitely sturdy and well built, but not too heavy for an adult to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin & Isaac’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Buckled badly on first use
customer_reviews.text: This step is cheap, fragile and dangerous. It buckled after one day of use. Unusable now. My wife and I both weigh 160 lbs, but it crumpled very easily. Recommend against buying this step.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Very stable platform.
customer_reviews.text: Very stable platform though the stepping platform has tendency to collect dirt and dust do to foot traffic, this part of the platform is hard to clean. The product is very stable and has not failed.
customer_reviews.author: DrBA

customer_reviews.title: perfect extra step for your rv
customer_reviews.text: much cheaper than purchasing a new set of steps to get that extra step. our rv trlr is quite far off the ground, and only has 3 steps...really needs 4 and this makes it 4
customer_reviews.author: blacklisted

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit.  Very heavy duty.  I would buy this again but will probably never need to, its that well built.
customer_reviews.text: Great Unit, been using it on our motorhome whenever leveling the coach lifts the front end too much. Most of the time I use it with the legs folded under, and a couple of times with the legs out as the front of the coach was close to having the tires off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: BigBill

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: Great little step, just what I needed for my camper where the steps were just too high. This made it perfect and was more steady than a small stool.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: FIRST STEP into the RV? - NOT A PROBLEM for this post-op back fusion RV-er.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER STABLE for that "FIRST STEP to the RV" - as in, watch out for the first step it's a LULU - and especially if you have just had back fusion surgery. That's why I ordered it - and it is a very large step so no problem with wrong footing, and the legs make it very stable. GREAT quality - good item for the price- looks like it will last forever! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This step is nice and big, sturdy and seems to be well made. Only gave it 4 stars because I think is should be at least an inch taller.
customer_reviews.author: ABQBob

customer_reviews.title: company doesn’t seem to employ quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Step seems sturdy. Arrived with 4 dents in it but the box was undamaged...tells me that it was damaged at factory before shipping. One leg was loose due to the bracket holding it being bent. Overall, I guess it does as advertised, just disappointed in the condition it arrived in considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Bear

customer_reviews.title: Step
customer_reviews.text: Love the step for width and top has non slip on it. Hate that covers on feet of step do not stay on and will be lost in near future
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel trailers
customer_reviews.text: My parents have an Avion trailer that has the three pull out steps. When they travel and place the trailer in certain locations there is always a gap and this step has been able to fill that void.
customer_reviews.author: RobledoNYC

customer_reviews.title: Step Stool
customer_reviews.text: This item works great as the bottom step on are class C RV.
customer_reviews.author: G. Garoutte

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Arizona heat causes the slip resistant surface coating to separate from the step.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I love the large surface to step on most steps that I had previously looked at were smaller platforms this one is a great size
customer_reviews.author: angie hebert

customer_reviews.title: Good Platform
customer_reviews.text: The platform is large and the splayed legs make it very stable. I was worried about some of the steps that I looked at because I was afraid they might "roll" if someone didn't step carefully in the middle of the step.
customer_reviews.author: Oley

customer_reviews.title: Step stool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stool to use with my camper. Sometime to level it we need an extra step because I am short.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bilheimer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy , was exactly the right size to bridge the gap between the bottom step and the ground. Very well built
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Step is solid & perfect for use with our camper
customer_reviews.text: Step is solid & perfect for use with our camper. Love the fact that it can be used with legs folded or used with legs up for a higher step. I did a lot of comparisons on line before purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Foster

customer_reviews.title: Handy Step
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy piece of hardware. We use it to make our car and RV accessible for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Q

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but a bit heavy to lift. For me anyway. It's a conundrum.
customer_reviews.author: Why can't I just do stars?

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: After tumbling out of my camper a couple of times, I finally found the platform step that works! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber shoe missing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but it only came with three rubber shoes. Not good when it has four legs How do I get the missing rubber shoe?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wife likes the large platform area and i like the easy fold legs for
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for our RV. wife likes the large platform area and i like the easy fold legs for storage
customer_reviews.author: Ray D.

customer_reviews.title: Great construction wide enough to prevent slippage
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our travel trailer Great construction wide enough to prevent slippage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but TOO heavy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great step but not the weight as listed on the specifications. Step was to be used to help my 86 year old mother-in-law in and out of the car. Because of the weight of the step, I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nana x 5

customer_reviews.title: The legs are not as sturdy as I would like
customer_reviews.text: Received it in the day it was due. Packaged very well. The legs are not as sturdy as I would like, but all in all is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat 22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and large enough, sturdy, and a little on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: E. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: This step is the perfect height . Its taller than any other step I was looking at. The non slip grip works really well, and the metal is heavy duty. It's a really sturdy and durable step.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for RV's. Great for getting elderly into taller vehicles!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful device for getting my elderly Mom into my SUV. It is very sturdy and she feels very safe when stepping on it. It advertises 2 different heights but if you do not unfold the legs it is even shorter, so you have 3 different heights. The price was $30 cheaper than I found at our RV accessory stores.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect fit for a step for my camper. Very well constructed and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great step; really worked well on our recent trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Great step; really worked well on our recent trip and purchase price was much lower than the other comp. brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Braafhart

customer_reviews.title: ... it once and there is already a bubble of good size in the abrasive covering
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and there is already a bubble of good size in the abrasive covering
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Norman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that step down from our RV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that step down from our RV. Very sturdy and folds perfectly to fit in an outside cargo hold.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jolley

customer_reviews.title: A must for a Camper or Motorhome.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide step for the Motorhome when we park on unlevel ground. Nice and sturdy, nice and wide with a good grip even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mary Mac

product_meta.title: Stromberg Carlson S-150 Steel Platform Step
product_meta.description: Stromberg Carlson Steel Plaatform Step. Features non-skid tape that keeps your foot planted where you put it. This steel step can be used at 4 inch with the legs folded, or at 8 inch with the legs open. Made with high-grade steel and a powder coat finish to resist rust. 24 Inch Width x 16 inch Depth x 4 Inch Height or 8 Inch Height.
feature_bullets: Features non-skid tape that keeps your foot planted where you put it
This steel step can be used at 4 inch with the legs folded, or at 8 inch with the legs open
Made with high-grade steel and a powder coat finish to resist rust
24 Inch Width x 16 inch Depth x 4 Inch Height or 8 Inch Height

specifications.Cover Included: Stromberg Carlson S-150 Platform Step - Steel Platform
